title: Blind Corners
description: What you do in the dark is your business. Keeping it buried is hers. Jay Nova is a private eye with a secret. She can read minds. What she can't do is control when it triggers, what it reveals or the pain it causes. Especially the pain. Still, with a ready gun and sure hand she walks to danger "fixing" problems for the desperate. Coldly, effeciently ... off the books. But clean slates carry a price those crossed want paid in blood. Hers. Blind Corners: an illustrated crime collection where violence and lies are tools of the trade and each move made can be the last.
author: Jemir Robert Johnson
